markdown:
<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Rise of the Kaiju](/Articles.aspx?ID=42)</title>

**Source** [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 66

Tremble in awe and piece together the mysteries of the ground-shaking goliaths, skyscraping saurians, and benthic behemoths known as kaiju.
name: Rise of the Kaiju
